entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 1.7°C

Visibility: 24.1 km

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High 12. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers this morning and early this afternoon. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h this morning. High 12. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Wednesday 04 May 2016
